name: Welcome to ChadOS
detail: Welcome to the ChadOS platform. We just need to take care of a couple of things before we can begin.

name: Set up an account
detail: Type in the username you'd like to use when using ChadOS. This username will be used to create a special user file for you that apps and services can use to customize the ChadOS experience to you. This username may also be used as your in-game name.

name: You're all set!
detail: ChadOS is ready to be used. We hope you like ChadOS as much as we did making it.
